Class BankAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • BankAccount
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChequingAccount, SavingsAccount

    public abstract class BankAccount
extends java.lang.Object
    description of class below..simple abstract bank account object....and does what?
    Since:
    JDK 1.8
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Patrick Czermak

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected long accountNo
      accountNo is a randomly generated long number which doesn't change throughout this package once assigned to an account.
      protected double balance
      balance refers to the actual balance which is randomly generated within this package to be between ($20.00 - 100.00), the balance gets updated with interest rate and fee changes.
      protected static int numAccounts
      numAccounts is set once and the randomly generated item is used through the package.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BankAccount()
      CONSTRUCTOR - creating a BankAccount account number randomly.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) abstract void calculateAndUpdateBalance()
      ABSTRACT METHOD to calculate and update balance.
      double getBalance()
      Gets and returns the balance.
      java.lang.String toString()
      METHOD toString to display the account number and balance.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • balance

        protected double balance
        balance refers to the actual balance which is randomly generated within this package to be between ($20.00 - 100.00), the balance gets updated with interest rate and fee changes.

      • accountNo

        protected long accountNo
        accountNo is a randomly generated long number which doesn't change throughout this package once assigned to an account.

      • numAccounts

        protected static int numAccounts
        numAccounts is set once and the randomly generated item is used through the package.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BankAccount

        public BankAccount()
        CONSTRUCTOR - creating a BankAccount account number randomly.

    • Method Detail

      • getBalance

        public double getBalance()
        Gets and returns the balance.
        Returns:
        balance

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        METHOD toString to display the account number and balance. It uses the toString methods from ChequingAccount and SavingsAccount which hold their information about their respective accounts. Combined they display the appropriate information for EACH account as requested by user.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • calculateAndUpdateBalance

        abstract void calculateAndUpdateBalance()
        ABSTRACT METHOD to calculate and update balance. every child class will have this method. Overrides the calculateAndUpdate methods of class ChequingAccount and SavingsAccount. Because a declaration of an abstract method NO NEED for "{ }" .
